title: Queue auto decline

embed.description: Anyone else getting this? The box will popup for me to accept or decline a game. Sometimes it will instantly close the box and say I failed to respond or I declined the game. When I did nothing. Sometimes it allows me to accept only to then say I have been removed from the queue for not accepting or declining.

body:
Does anyone know how to fix the queue auto-decline bug i can't even play a match it declines even when i hit accept.
Why does this still happen i found other people complaining about it 5 years ago but there's still no solutions  posted. 
I have already reinstalled the game to no avail. 
I'm real close to starting queues and not accepting just so others have to suffer my fate too.{{champion:17}}

replies.body: It sounds like when you click on accept, the client tries to send that click to our servers to place you in the match but our servers are never actually getting that signal. Most of the time those delays inputs/clicks are caused by packet loss, which we can check for using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Hit me back up with a screenshot of what it says!
